typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source3
source1 select(mapColumn(
		s_no = sr_no,
		employee_f_name = employee_first_name,
		employee_l_name = employee_last_name,
		ages = age,
		schools = school,
		colleges = college
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1, source2 exists(Select2@employee_first_name == source2@employee_first_name,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> dataExists
source3 aggregate(groupBy(employee_first_name,
		employee_last_name)) ~> AggregateIts
